Function Documentation

int init_pri_ui (  ) 

Function:
init_pri_ui
Description:
Initialize the primary user interface. The P3 primary application does not interact directly with an administrator, the p3admin application does. Then that application communicates changes to the P3 primary through a FIFO. The P3 primary interface then updates the configuration, and if appropriate, dynamically updates the application.
Inputs:
  • None
Outputs:
  • int: Status
    • 0 = OK
    • <0 = Error

References NULL, p3buf, p3calloc, p3errmsg(), p3MSG_CRIT, and pri_ui_handler().

Referenced by main().

Here is the call graph for this function:

int pri_ui_handler (  ) 

Function:
pri_ui_handler
Description:
Wait for input from the administrator interface through a FIFO. The P3 primary interface then updates the configuration, and if appropriate, dynamically updates the application.
Inputs:
  • None
Outputs:
  • int: Status
    • 0 = OK
    • <0 = Error

Referenced by init_pri_ui().
